name: Sumu
description: Polaris is a deity referred to in ancient sources as the god of the Dark Forest. But one day, when Heaven lost the Star, anomalies and curses descended upon the world, disfiguring the remains of the world into images of evil spirits. You are the wandering spirit Sumu, who found a shard of deity in a dark forest and your task is to bring the shard back to Heaven. Be brave and don't be afraid of the dark forest.
